snippet: The Orlando Consort brought a program of early music, both sacred and earthly, to the Church of St. Mary the Virgin.
abstract: James R Oestreich reviews Orlando Consort program of early music at Church of St Mary the Virgin.
lead_paragraph: The Orlando Consort brought a program of early music, both sacred and earthly, to the Church of St. Mary the Virgin.

headline.seo: Orlando Consort Presents Program of Machaut
headline.main: A Love Affair That Burned for Centuries, at Least in Song
headline.print_headline: A Love Affair That Burned for Centuries, at Least in Song
